original_title: Hay una Luz que Siempre se Apaga
overview: Aurora and Mariano come to live in a house in the country with the hope of starting a family and starting a life together, everything gets complicated when Mariano, after being lost in the hill for 2 days, returns behaving violent and distant, Aurora suspects a beast she has taken the body of her husband.
tagline: Aurora suspects a beast has taken over her husband's body
title: There Is a Light That Always Goes Out
